questions.question: What is the overall shape of the coffee table's top surface?
What primary material appears to constitute the table's body?
What color best describes the wood used in this coffee table?
How many distinct shelves or tiers does this coffee table possess?
What shape best characterizes the lower shelf of the table?
Describe the general style of the legs supporting the table.
What seems to be the material of the small, connecting elements between table legs and top?
Considering the wood grain, what is the apparent texture of the table's surface?
What is the apparent finish of the wood; is it glossy or matte?
Does the coffee table exhibit any noticeable patterns or markings on its surface?
What is the visual impression of the overall design aesthetic of the coffee table?
Describe the visual position of the lower shelf relative to the upper one.
Is there any visible evidence of joinery or assembly between the wood pieces?
What would you describe the overall size of the coffee table as?
Observing the legs, are they uniformly thick or do they taper?
